Class BulletSpawner.BulletSpawnerBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.rikuthin.entities.Entity.EntityBuilder<BulletSpawner.BulletSpawnerBuilder>
com.rikuthin.entities.bullets.BulletSpawner.BulletSpawnerBuilder
Enclosing class:
BulletSpawner
public static class BulletSpawner.BulletSpawnerBuilder extends Entity.EntityBuilder<BulletSpawner.BulletSpawnerBuilder>
The EntityBuilder class provides a fluent API for constructing an Entity object.

    The key of the spawned bullet's initial active animation.

    isSpawning
    true if the spawner is currently creating bullets; false otherwise.

    The Entity that owns/controls the spawner.

  • Constructor Details

    • BulletSpawnerBuilder

      public BulletSpawnerBuilder(JPanel panel, Entity owner)
      Constructs a new BulletSpawnerBuilder to create a BulletSpawner instance.
      Parameters:
      panel - The JPanel the spawner with eventually live in/be contained by.
      owner - The Entity that will eventually control the created spawner.

  • Method Details

    • bulletDamage

      public BulletSpawner.BulletSpawnerBuilder bulletDamage(int bulletDamage)
      Sets the amount of damage that bullets created by this spawner should deal upon impact.
      Parameters:
      bulletDamage - The amount of damage.
      Returns:
      The updated BulletSpawnerBuilder with the new parameter configured.

    • isSpawning

      public BulletSpawner.BulletSpawnerBuilder isSpawning(boolean isSpawning)
      Sets whether the spawner should create bullets.
      Parameters:
      isSpawning - true if creating bullets, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      The updated BulletSpawnerBuilder with the new parameter configured.

    • bulletVelocityX

      public BulletSpawner.BulletSpawnerBuilder bulletVelocityX(double bulletVelocityX)
      Sets the movement speed of spawned bullets along the x-axis in pixels per frame.
      Parameters:
      bulletVelocityX - The bullet's x-axis velocity.
      Returns:
      The updated BulletSpawnerBuilder with the new parameter configured.

    • bulletVelocityY

      public BulletSpawner.BulletSpawnerBuilder bulletVelocityY(double bulletVelocityY)
      Sets the movement speed of spawned bullets along the y-axis in pixels per frame.
      Parameters:
      bulletVelocityY - The bullet's y-axis velocity.
      Returns:
      The updated BulletSpawnerBuilder with the new parameter configured.

    • bulletAnimationKeys

      public final BulletSpawner.BulletSpawnerBuilder bulletAnimationKeys(Set<String> bulletAnimationKeys)
      Sets the set of keys this entity can query AnimationTemplateRepository with.
      Parameters:
      bulletAnimationKeys - The set of animation keys.
      Returns:
      The updated BulletSpawnerBuilder with the new parameter configured.

    • currentBulletAnimationKey

      public final BulletSpawner.BulletSpawnerBuilder currentBulletAnimationKey(String key)
      Sets the animation for the entity.

      Key must either be null (for no animation) or a valid (non-blank) string.

      Valid strings must be a AnimationTemplate key within AnimationTemplateRepository and must exist within the entity's current key set.

      Parameters:
      key - The unique key identifying the animation.
      Returns:
      The updated BulletSpawnerBuilder with the new parameter configured.

    • build

      public BulletSpawner build()
      Creates a new BulletSpawner with the set values.
      Returns:
      The new bullet spawner.
